name: market for base plaster | base plaster | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4944/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'base plaster', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;The product "base plaster" represents a mixture of raw materials in the following ratio: sand: 0.772kg, cement: 0.205kg, lime hydrated: 0.023kg, additives: 0.0002kg. It is used as a base and finishing coat, dado, for indoor and outdoor use. A user employing this module should add 0.082 kg water (water is not included in this module).

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'base plaster',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  base plaster', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
